name: Guilt of the Beast
description:
WOOPS

Lol so we didn't exactly finish on time. So the game isn't so much of a game but more of a small little explorable forest. Enjoy nonetheless

WASD to move, SPACEBAR to meditate, click and drag to shoot

CREDS

Art: Logan Phresh

Additional Art and Animation: Nick Conter, Digimin, and FuShark

Programming: ninjamuffin99

Music is "Forest Of An Ancient Civilization" by DarkGod666 on Newgrounds : https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/782721
